name: BioBridge Ltd
goal: BioBridge® was founded in 1989 in Cambridge UK by Mr Meredith Lloyd-Evans. BioBridge focuses on understanding and overcoming barriers to commercialisation for innovation in bioscience technologies and products and its work spans the entire product chain from discovery development to market entry. Its clients: companies, individuals, HEIs and public bodies - are in healthcare, biotechnology, medical devices, biomaterials, agricultural resources, animal health, ‘green’ and ‘blue’ industries and food.
interests: Agriculture, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Veterinary Medicines Legislation review, existing Veterinary Legislation and EMA guidelines and proposed guidelines to be reviewed, existing legislation relating to EFSA and food safety, guidelines and recommendations and proposed guidelines for review, regulations concerning medical devices, Blue growth strategy for DG Mare; Horizon 2020 projects
